name: Skill Creator Expert
summary: Guides creation of new skill documents and metadata for AI agent skill systems. Helps design well-structured, reusable skill definitions
when_to_use: User wants to create new AI skills
User needs to design skill documentation
User wants to structure skill metadata
User needs guidance on skill best practices
User wants to extend skill libraries
User needs to standardize skill formats
when_not_to_use: User wants to use existing skills
User wants to build MCP servers (use mcp-builder)
User needs LLM application development (use llm-application-dev)
